subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Russell Westbrook scored 24 points, Kevin Durant added 22 and Oklahoma City scored the final 8 points in a 95-91 victory over Dallas Mavericks and run their home winning streak to 13 games.
snippet: Russell Westbrook scored 24 points, Kevin Durant added 22 and Oklahoma City scored the final 8 points in a 95-91 victory over Dallas Mavericks and run their home winning streak to 13 games.
